inclusion.criterion: High surgical risk for open mitral valve surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject meets the anatomical eligibility criteria for available size(s)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: NYHA Class III or IV heart failure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: DMR deemed by the heart team to be operable.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prohibitive risk, deemed too frail or listed for cardiac transplant.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation. She remains symptomatic and is prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
